bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model

Class VoronoiDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model.VoronoiDiagram

  • public class VoronoiDiagram
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all information about the voronoi diagram created by VoronoiGenerator.generateVoronoiDiagram(Collection, Rectangle). Vertices are created for every point two edges meet and for intersections with the bounding box. Edges are splitting cells that are associated to each of the processed vectors.
